February , 2011 [Max Hamilton]25-max stood on the sandy stretch of beach at the back of [[his]25-max home]77-his home , shivering as [he]25-max stared blankly at [the ocean]78-the ocean , and scowling at the water crashing to the shore as though it were the enemy . The night was nearly pitch - black , but there was enough illumination from the moon and stars to see [the churning ocean]79-the churning ocean in front of [him]25-max . In a very elemental way , it was [[his]25-max nemesis]80-his nemesis , the body of water that had taken [Mia]26-mia away from [him]25-max . And at the moment , [he]25-max resented every drop of water in [the Atlantic Ocean]2-the atlantic ocean . Somewhere , [[his]25-max wife]81-his wife was lifelessly floating in this body of water , buried in a watery grave , and [he]25-max could feel [her]81-his wife moving farther and farther away from [him]25-max . It was as though [she]81-his wife had torn [his]25-max heart from [his]25-max chest and carried it with [her]81-his wife , and [he]25-max was standing here helplessly , bleeding out from the gaping wound . [He]25-max put a hand to [his]25-max chest and rubbed , but it did n’t stop the excruciating pain . No … dammit . [She]26-mia ca n’t be gone . [I]0-i thought [I]0-i had plenty of time to figure out [my]0-i irrational emotions . [I]0-i thought [I]0-i could work everything out of [my]0-i system and love [her]26-mia the way [she]26-mia deserved to be loved . [His]25-max legs weak , [he]25-max dropped to the sand on [his]25-max ass , the moisture sinking into the denim of [his]25-max jeans , but [he]25-max ignored it , [his]25-max gaze fixated on [the water]82-the water . [He]25-max was too numb to feel the external elements , too devastated to care , [his]25-max whole being focused on [Mia]26-mia , as though [he]25-max could bring [her]26-mia back by sheer force of will . [He]25-max ignored not only the chill of the wind buffeting [his]25-max body , which was clad only in a t - shirt and jeans , but the mosquitoes making a meal of [his]25-max exposed flesh , and the excruciating sense of loss that was so painful [he]25-max had to block it or go insane . Every muscle in [his]25-max body was tense , [his]25-max fists clenched , [his]25-max brain trying to keep [his]25-max emotions in check . To mourn would mean that [he]25-max was accepting the fact that [Mia]26-mia was gone forever , and [he]25-max did n’t want to believe it . Screw it . [He]25-max ’d stay in denial . If [he]25-max accepted that [she]26-mia had drowned off [the shore of [this very beach]84-this very beach]83-the shore of this very beach , [he]25-max ’d never live through the agony of it . [Max Hamilton]25-max did n’t cry . Never had . Even when [[his]25-max parents]85-his parents had been killed in a tragic accident , [he]25-max ’d buried the urge , knowing [they]85-his parents ’d be ashamed of [him]25-max . No [Hamilton]25-max wallowed in emotion or let it overrule logic and control . [He]25-max knew [[his]25-max parents]85-his parents had loved [him]25-max , but [they]85-his parents had been born into wealth , and [they]85-his parents ’d always taught [him]25-max how to behave with decorum and moderation . [[His]25-max mom]87-his mom and [dad]88-dad always said [he]25-max was [a perfect child]89-a perfect child , and [they]85-his parents were proud of [him]25-max . Having been adopted , [Max]25-max had always wanted to stay perfect , and [he]25-max ’d tried , even after [they]85-his parents ’d died . The habit of trying to stay aloof and detached was something [he]25-max associated with love and approval . Now , [he]25-max was n’t so sure , [his]25-max gut telling [him]25-max that [Mia]26-mia may have died never knowing exactly how [he]25-max felt about [her]26-mia . Unfortunately , [he]25-max was n’t feeling very level or solid at the moment , and [his]25-max usual Hamilton demeanor was deserting [him]25-max completely . [Mia]26-mia had disappeared from [this spot]90-this spot exactly one week ago — [her]26-mia bag , clothing , and phone left on [this stretch of sand]91-this stretch of sand . [She]26-mia ’d always loved to take a quick swim here , calling it [[her]26-mia own little piece of paradise]92-her own little piece of paradise . Closing [his]25-max eyes , [Max]25-max pictured [her]26-mia face , [her]26-mia mischievous expression and teasing smile . Christ , how [he]25-max hated it when [she]26-mia went swimming alone , did things that [he]25-max considered dangerous . [He]25-max ’d lectured [her]26-mia like [a teacher]93-a teacher might do with [a student]94-a student , but [she]26-mia ’d always laughed at [him]25-max , cajoling [him]25-max out of [his]25-max anger , telling [him]25-max [he]25-max was too serious and worried too much . Problem was , [he]25-max never could stay angry with [her]26-mia . [Damn woman]95-damn woman had had [him]25-max wrapped around [her]26-mia little finger almost from the moment [they]96-they had met , and [he]25-max had happily let [her]26-mia do it . [He]25-max ’d cautioned [her]26-mia when [she]26-mia ’d done things that worried the shit out of [him]25-max . And then , [he]25-max ’d let [her]26-mia go on [her]26-mia merry way , let [her]26-mia think [he]25-max was only mildly concerned , when in reality , [he]25-max was fucking terrified of losing [her]26-mia . [He]25-max was [the serious one]97-the serious one , the man who did everything cautiously and logically . And [Mia]26-mia … ah [Mia]26-mia : [she]26-mia made [him]25-max happy , [she]26-mia made [him]25-max laugh , [she]26-mia made [him]25-max whole , and [she]26-mia made [him]25-max want to lose control completely . But [he]25-max never had . Not once . [He]25-max ’d managed to leash the bestial instincts [she]26-mia brought out in [him]25-max . Just barely . “ It was [our]98-our deal , ”[25-max] [he]25-max whispered hoarsely , although the actual agreement had never been official or talked about . “ [I]26-mia handled the serious stuff and [you]26-mia helped [me]26-mia lighten up . ”[26-mia] [She]26-mia made [him]25-max laugh when [he]25-max got too stuffy , and [he]25-max grounded [her]26-mia . Together , [they]98-our were perfection . Or maybe [Mia]26-mia was perfection , and [she]26-mia just made [him]25-max [a happier man]99-a happier man . It did n’t matter that [he]25-max had to fight the urge to turn into [a caveman]100-a caveman and conquer [her]26-mia constantly , wanting to drag [her]26-mia back to [[his]25-max lair]101-his lair . But [she]26-mia had never known about that , the secret part of [him]25-max that really wanted to be free . Because [I]0-i did n’t want to scare [her]26-mia away . [He]25-max laid back and covered [his]25-max face with one arm , releasing a strangled , tortured groan . Emotions warred inside [him]25-max , each fighting for dominance in a mind filled with chaotic thoughts : anger , despair , denial , and pain . Unfortunately , the agony filling [his]25-max heart and soul were winning , held back somewhat by denial . [She]26-mia ’s not dead . [She]26-mia ’s not dead . [I]0-i needed more time . Squeezing [his]25-max eyes tightly shut to decrease the burning sensation beneath [his]25-max eyelids from tears [he]25-max refused to shed , [he]25-max swallowed a sob that was rising in [his]25-max chest . [He]25-max and [Mia]26-mia were [a pair]102-a pair , and [he]25-max did n’t work without [her]26-mia . [They]103-they ’d been married for two years , clicking together like puzzle pieces that were only complete when they were interlinked , almost from the moment [they]103-they ’d met . [He]25-max ’d never believed in love at first sight or an instant connection … until [he]25-max ’d met [[his]25-max wife]81-his wife . [They]103-they were [complete opposites]105-complete opposites in so many ways , yet [they]103-they belonged together . That feeling had been there for [him]25-max from the very beginning of [his]25-max relationship with [[his]25-max wife]81-his wife , but [he]25-max ’d stayed in denial , thinking that the way [he]25-max ’d felt about [her]26-mia would eventually subside to a manageable level . It never did . And honestly , [Max]25-max knew it never would have . [He]25-max had just been too big of [an idiot]107-an idiot to admit it . Sitting up , [he]25-max wrapped [his]25-max arms around [his]25-max knees and rocked , fighting against every rational thought that entered [his]25-max head about [[his]25-max wife]81-his wife ’s disappearance . If [he]25-max started thinking logically , [he]25-max ’d have to admit [she]26-mia was probably dead . [Mia]26-mia would n’t disappear and not contact [him]25-max . [She]26-mia might be a little careless with [her]26-mia own safety at times , ditching [his]25-max security whenever [she]26-mia could , but [she]26-mia was never thoughtless . There was no way [she]26-mia would n’t contact [him]25-max unless [she]26-mia physically could n’t . “ Where are [you]26-mia , [Mia]26-mia ? ”[25-max] [he]25-max whispered huskily , [his]25-max voice desperate . “ Do n’t do this to [me]25-max . Please . [I]25-max need [you]26-mia . ”[25-max] [I]0-i should have told [her]26-mia [I]0-i loved [her]26-mia more often , spent more time with [her]26-mia instead of jetting from place to place in search of world domination and trying to hide the primitive instincts [she]26-mia brought out in [me]0-i . [I]0-i should n’t have run away . [She]26-mia might have been able to deal with that part of [me]0-i , just like [she]26-mia dealt with everything else . In reality , [he]25-max had n’t given [her]26-mia the chance . [He]25-max ’d never let [himself]25-max completely open up to [her]26-mia , had never told [her]26-mia exactly how [he]25-max felt . Now , when it was too late , [he]25-max regretted it . Rocking harder , [he]25-max opened [his]25-max eyes , and the tears finally flowed . [He]25-max swiped an arm across [his]25-max eyes , cursing angrily as [he]25-max roughly removed the droplets from [his]25-max ravaged face , but they kept returning , and that only pissed [him]25-max off more . Stumbling to [his]25-max feet , [he]25-max moved to the edge of [the water]82-the water and waded in , so damn tempted to lose [himself]25-max in [the ocean]78-the ocean if it was the only way [he]25-max and [Mia]26-mia could be together again . [She]26-mia ’s not dead . [She]26-mia ’s missing . [I]0-i ’m not giving up on [her]26-mia ! “ [Mia]26-mia ! ”[25-max] [His]25-max hoarse shout was carried away across [the water]82-the water by the brutal wind , [his]25-max body shivering as [he]25-max called desperately , “ Come back . ”[25-max] [No one]112-no one answered , and [he]25-max fell to [his]25-max knees in the frigid water , letting it lap over [his]25-max chest . [His]25-max tears mingled with the water , and [his]25-max hopelessness and anguish burst from [his]25-max throat in a painful sob . And then another . And another . The waves pushed [his]25-max body toward [the shore]113-the shore , and [he]25-max let the momentum carry [him]25-max . When [he]25-max reached [the sand]114-the sand , [he]25-max crawled on [his]25-max hands and knees for a short distance before collapsing on [the beach]115-the beach . Stop fucking crying . [She]116-she ’s not dead . [She]116-she ’s out there somewhere . [You]117-you need to find [her]116-she . Coughing hard , [he]25-max tried to stem the harsh sounds erupting from [his]25-max mouth , angry that [he]25-max was already mourning [a wife who had n’t yet been proved dead]118-a wife who had n’t yet been proved dead . So what if [the police]119-the police and [everyone else]120-everyone else thought [she]116-she was deceased ? [He]25-max was n’t giving up . [He]25-max ’d never give up . There was no activity on [her]116-she bank accounts , no sign [she]116-she was still alive . But [he]25-max was n’t going to stop until [he]25-max found [her]116-she . Barely sleeping since [she]116-she had disappeared , [he]25-max ’d spent the last week tearing through [Tampa]3-tampa looking for [her]116-she , hiring private resources when [the police]119-the police were basically shaking [their]119-the police heads in resignation . “ [I]25-max wo n’t give up on [you]116-she , [sweetheart]1139-sweetheart . [I]25-max promise , ”[25-max] [he]25-max muttered , [his]25-max lips gritty from the sand that was beginning to coat the inside of [his]25-max mouth as [he]25-max inhaled . “ [I]25-max ’ll wait forever . ”[25-max] [His]25-max vision blurring , [he]25-max stared determinedly at the crashing waves , exhaustion overwhelming [him]25-max . [He]25-max could see lights in the distance , boats passing through [his]25-max line of vision in the dark night . Blinking , [he]25-max tried to stay conscious , but blackness covered [him]25-max and [he]25-max succumbed to it , knowing [he]25-max was n’t leaving [this beach]122-this beach tonight . Maybe [he]25-max never would . Maybe [he]25-max ’d stay [here]123-here until [he]25-max died or [Mia]26-mia came back to [him]25-max . [The wet , shivering , bedraggled figure]124-the wet , shivering , bedraggled figure lay unmoving until daylight , opening [his]124-the wet , shivering , bedraggled figure eyes in the morning and hoping that everything that had happened in the last week had only been a dream . It wasn’t … and when [Max]25-max looked in the mirror the next day … [he]25-max had to admit to [himself]25-max that sometimes there were no second chances . Every so often , something or [someone extraordinary]125-someone extraordinary came along in life and there was only a small window of opportunity to snatch it and make it [your]126-your own . Unfortunately , [he]25-max ’d been [a coward , afraid of change]127-a coward , afraid of change , and [his]25-max “ [someone extraordinary ”]1140-someone extraordinary ”[25-max] had been taken away before [he]25-max could entirely claim [her]26-mia . For the first time in [his]25-max life , [Maxwell Hamilton]25-max was left with regrets . And it was excruciatingly painful . Later , [he]25-max might examine [his]25-max life and figure out whether or not [he]25-max really needed to be a robot that functioned with meticulous control and logic , doing only what was acceptable in [his]25-max mind . But that would come later , after the pain subsided . Unfortunately , that day never came .

The Present “ [I]25-max do n’t want [a woman]1141-a woman , [Maddie]27-maddie . [I]25-max ’m already married . ”[25-max] [Max]25-max fingered [his]25-max platinum wedding band , a ring that had rarely left [his]25-max finger since the day [he]25-max ’d gotten married , and would remain on the same damn finger even after [he]25-max was dead . Technically , [he]25-max was still married . [Mia]26-mia ’s body had never been recovered , nor had [she]26-mia been declared legally dead . [He]25-max took a deep breath and slowly let it out , savoring the smell of barbeque and the outdoors . Finding [Maddie]27-maddie had been a miracle , a gift that [he]25-max did n’t want to squander . [Max]25-max smiled , wondering how [[his]25-max friend and brother - in - law]144-his friend and brother - in - law was going to survive this pregnancy with [Maddie]27-maddie . [[His]25-max sister]146-his sister was thirty - five , two years [his]25-max senior , and [she]146-his sister wanted [this baby]147-this baby so desperately . [Maddie]27-maddie ’s quest for [his]25-max happiness was endearing , but misguided , and it only reminded [him]25-max of what [he]25-max ’d lost . “ If something happened to [Sam]28-sam , when would [you]25-max be ready to be with [someone else]1144-someone else ? ”[27-maddie] [Her]27-maddie face fell and [Max]25-max felt like [a complete asshole]154-a complete asshole . [He]25-max knew [she]27-maddie meant well and wanted [him]25-max to be as happy as [she]27-maddie was now with [Sam]28-sam , but [he]25-max could n’t take it anymore and [he]25-max desperately needed [her]27-maddie to back off . [He]25-max ’d spent the last two and a half years trying to just stay sane , the pain in [his]25-max chest never going away , trying to function every day and push through the agony of living without [Mia]26-mia . It was better not to think about romantic relationships at all . There was no happily ever after for [him]25-max . There was only survival . And [he]25-max was much better off working , exhausting [himself]25-max into sleep , and being grateful for [the family]155-the family and [friends]74-friends [he]25-max had . [He]25-max did n’t want [another woman]157-another woman . There was [no substitute]158-no substitute . [He]25-max just was n’t built that way .
